long_description: With mondo wheels to roll over obstacles and remote lockout on the 100mm suspension fork, our Novara Ponderosa(R) 29er mountain bike makes it easy for riders to adjust to the flow of trails. Butted 6061 aluminum frame features an S-bend down tube and bent seat tube for enhanced handling, fit and performance. SR Suntour Raidon-LO Air 29 fork boasts a customizable spring rate, stiff 32mm stanchions, alloy steerer, magnesium lowers and lockout. SRAM X7 drivetrain offers the reliability and weight savings of a 2x10 drivetrain while maintaining fast, precise gear changes to meet changing terrain. Tektro Auriga Pro hydraulic disc brakes maintain consistent performance in all conditions. Double-walled Weinmann rims are wrapped with WTB Nano Comp tires for fast-rolling performance and consistent traction. Specs on the Novara Ponderosa 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
